pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is an implementation of Cloud Haskell, as described in /Towards Haskell in the Cloud/ by Jeff Epstein, Andrew Black, and Simon Peyton Jones (<http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/simonpj/papers/parallel/>), although some of the details are different. The precise message passing semantics are based on /A unified semantics for future Erlang/ by Hans Svensson, Lars-Ã…ke Fredlund and Clara Benac Earle. You will probably also want to install a Cloud Haskell backend such as distributed-process-simplelocalnet.
